dcterms:description: EPIC-Kitchens 55 is a dataset that only includes daily activities videos in the kitchen. It comprises a set of 432 egocentric videos recorded by 32 participants in their kitchens using a head-mounted camera.
dcterms:title: EPIC-Kitchens 55

dcterms:description: The Ego4D dataset is the most recent large-scale egocentric video dataset. It contains 3,670 hours of egocentric videos of people performing diverse tasks, such as farming or cooking, and is collected by 931 people from 74 locations across nine different countries worldwide.
dcterms:title: Ego4D
